title: Sampling feature
description: Feature on which observations may be made, which is intended to be representative of a different (usually larger) feature that is not fully accessible for some reason.

id.title: id
id.description: A unique identifier for the sampling feature

type.title: type
type.description: Identifies the type of sampling feature, which determines the type of the result property

sampledFeature.title: sampledFeature
sampledFeature.description: the feature which the sampling feature was designed to sample

relatedObservation.title: relatedObservation
relatedObservation.description: Observation that uses this sampling feature

complex.title: complex
complex.description: link to related sampling features - THIS SHOULD HAVE AN ARRAY OF VALUES
